bwwExcerpt: Hiddleston has the great actor's gift of stillness; when Robert learns of the affair, he doesn't rage, but tears glitter in his eyes and gradually spill down his cheeks, unchecked vulnerability springing forth from this coolly controlled man. It's extraordinary to witness.
